title: Edu+
description: A website that helps students to find the best courses!.
fullDescription: Edu + is a platform that offers you online or ofline courses in different fields and from different schools, there is something for everyone , make your choice and embark on a new adventure

title: HeelSeek
description: A website that helps patients to find the best doctors!.
fullDescription: HeelSeek is a comprehensive online platform designed to bridge the gap between patients and healthcare providers. Whether you're a patient seeking a trusted doctor or a healthcare professional looking to manage your practice efficiently, HeelSeek offers a seamless, user-friendly experience tailored to your needs. With advanced search functionality, multilingual support, and robust appointment management, HeelSeek ensures that healthcare is accessible, transparent, and efficient for everyone.
url: https://healseek.vercel.app/en (it may take a while to load bcz of render)

title: Gestion atelier
description: A private website that helps a company to manage its workshop!.
fullDescription: The Workshop Management System is a comprehensive, private web platform designed to streamline and optimize the operations of a company's workshop. This powerful tool enables efficient management of machines, repairs, and overall workshop activities through an intuitive and user-friendly interface.
